text: It doesn't matter about money having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end.
author: Billy Idol

text: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

text: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
author: Sophocles

text: Money: power at its most liquid.
author: Mason Cooley

text: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
author: J. Paul Getty
